name: WidgetInspector
desc: A widget that enables inspecting the child widget's structure.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget that is being inspected.

fields.name: exitWidgetSelectionButtonBuilder
fields.desc: A builder that is called to create the exit select-mode button.

fields.name: moveExitWidgetSelectionButtonBuilder
fields.desc: A builder that is called to create the button that moves the exit select- mode button to the right or left.

fields.name: tapBehaviorButtonBuilder
fields.desc: A builder that is called to create the button that changes the default tap behavior when Select Widget mode is enabled.
